text: We need more games with a 60s/70s, hippy and psychedelic presentation. It was easily the best part of this game and what made it stick with me. The rest of the game was solid as well, it's too bad it flew under everyone's radar and is barely mentioned anymore. Love this theme, great instrumentation.
author: SupraDarky

text: Belongs on a Pink Floyd album

text: This really is some solid retro synth. Kudos to you for bringing all kinds of great music into the spotlight and showcasing what "video game music" is in all its aspects.
